topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539820fb6368720ae9200600#post_539820fb6368720ae9200600
Not all Christian ideologies are inherently bad.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539821706368720bef910600#post_539821706368720bef910600
I didn't say they were. I simply mean that Might For Right is a spiritual ideal.

In fact, I'm of the opinion that relative to nearly every powerful religion Christianity is pretty much one of the better ones.

Even its great "crimes" of the past are mostly based on mythical ahistorical retellings in our media (meaning movies and shows) and certainly no worse than the times in general were.
But really that has more to do with the fact that our popular conception of the Dark Ages in Europe is pretty incorrect based on the best evidence we have.
Listverse has a great little thing on the Middle Ages (top 10 myths or something) that SeraphimDawn linked a while ago.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
Hey this is random of me but I must ask.

Was anyone here when John Joseco was doing all those request's a while back on last year's December?

You see, I requested something from em and like, never got it and I was even on the stream when he was drawing it so I know it has to be somewhere?

He usually uploads requests to his tumblr, but he stopped doing that apparently since all those requests from those streams never got uploaded there.

I don't know if he was like, sending them out to people personally via something or anything?

I've been putting it off for awhile now cuz I'm a little shy and didn't want to bother em.

Especially since all the bullshit tumblr was giving him at the time I didn't think it would have been right or appropriate of me to just go and ask him something as meaningless as that while he was probably stressed out.

I'm sorry if this is a strange question, but I just wanted to know if he like maybe uploaded them to like a different source or something?

(But at the same time if he really did upload them on the internet I'd probably see most of them show up here or somewhere else already so he probably didn't)

~Maybe I shouldn't be asking this~
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
so yet again after coming back from the beach i got a cold and my ear got infected.

fuckin great
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539857fe636872288bf50000#post_539857fe636872288bf50000
The way you cure a ear infection is to chew bubble gum; just keep chewing until your ear canal opens letting your inner ear de-pressurize.  You'll know when your ear de-pressurizes cause the air will woosh out.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53985b65636872413e940100#post_53985b65636872413e940100


i was injected already and got some drug prescriptions since its an inflammation, and with that chewing bubble gum wont really stop the really strong pain.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53985bca6368726068d90000#post_53985bca6368726068d90000
Actually it will; the pain is from the pressure inside your ear being too high.  By chewing gum until the ear canal opens up it will help re-pressurize your ear.

You'll know it's worked when you hear a pop sound and the gunk wooshing out.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
